subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Despite dominating play at times and outshooting Pittsburgh, 38-21, the Islanders were eliminated when Brooks Orpik scored in overtime, giving the Penguins a series victory in six games.
snippet: Despite dominating play at times and outshooting Pittsburgh, 38-21, the Islanders were eliminated when Brooks Orpik scored in overtime, giving the Penguins a series victory in six games.
